util module

util.convert_to_png(input_image_path: str, output_image_path: str)[source]

convers images of all formats to .png

Args:

input_image_path (str): path to read the image output_image_path (_type_): path to save the image

util.get_filename(path: str) → str[source]

gets file name

Args:

path (str): file path

Returns:

str: file name

util.mkdir_working(overwrite: bool = False)[source]

makes a working dir to store intermediate files

Args:

overwrite (bool, optional): overwrite previous working directory. Defaults to False.

util.read_image(path: str) → Image | None[source]

reads image at given path

Args:

path (str): image file path

Returns:

PIL.Image | None : image file if it can be read.

util.resize_image(input_path, output_path, size)[source]

Resizes an image to the specified target size.

Args:

input_path (str): Path to the input image. output_path (str): Path to save the resized image. target_size (int): The desired size for the largest dimension (width or height).

Returns:

None

util.resize_images(folder_path, dim)[source]

Resizes all PNG images in the specified folder to have the largest dimension equal to ‘dim’.

Args:

folder_path (str): Path to the folder containing PNG images. dim (int): Desired size for the largest dimension (width or height).

Returns:

None

util.run_system_command(command: str) → bool[source]

Runs a system command and checks if it was successful.

Args:

command (str): The system command to execute.

Returns:

bool: True if the command was successful, False otherwise.

util.save_image(image: UploadFile, filename: str)[source]

Saves the uploaded image to a PNG file.
